code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Login: User Credentials
    Login --> TokensGenerated: Success
    
    state TokensGenerated {
        [*] --> AccessToken_Stateless
        [*] --> RefreshToken_Stateful
    }
    
    AccessToken_Stateless --> Active: valid for 15m
    Active --> Expired: after 15m
    Expired --> Refresh: use RefreshToken
    
    RefreshToken_Stateful --> StoredInDB: Active for 7d
    StoredInDB --> Rotated: Refresh RPC called
    Rotated --> DeletedFromDB: Old Token
    Rotated --> StoredInDB: New Token Pair Issued
    
    StoredInDB --> Revoked: DeleteUser called
    Revoked --> [*]
    
    Expired --> [*]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
